com.canoo.platform.server.spi

Interface ServerModule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBaseModule, ClientSessionModule, CorsModule, HttpMutexModule, HttpTimeoutModule, ServerTimingModule

    @API(since="0.x",
     status=EXPERIMENTAL)
public interface ServerModule
    This interface defines a server module that will automatically be started when the Dolphin Platform server component starts. Dolphin Platform will search for all implementations of this interface on the classpath that are annotated by ModuleDefinition and will automatically start them based on the order that is defined by the ModuleDefinition annotation.
    Author:
    Hendrik Ebbers
    See Also:
    ModuleDefinition

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Some modules depend on other modules.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the unique name of the module.
      void initialize(ServerCoreComponents coreComponents)
      This method will be called by the Dolphin Platform to initialize the module.
      boolean shouldBoot(PlatformConfiguration configuration)
      Returns true if the module will be booted at the Dolphin Platform bootstrap, otherwise false.

    • Method Detail

      • getModuleDependencies

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getModuleDependencies()
        Some modules depend on other modules. This method returns a collection of the names of all modules that are needed to start this module. The name of a module is defined in the ModuleDefinition annotation.
        Returns:
        a set of the names of all modules that are needed to start this module

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the unique name of the module.
        Returns:
        the unique name of the module

      • shouldBoot

        boolean shouldBoot(PlatformConfiguration configuration)
        Returns true if the module will be booted at the Dolphin Platform bootstrap, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the Dolphin Platform configuration
        Returns:
        true if the module will be booted

      • initialize

        void initialize(ServerCoreComponents coreComponents)
         throws ModuleInitializationException
        This method will be called by the Dolphin Platform to initialize the module.
        Parameters:
        coreComponents - the core components
        Throws:
        ModuleInitializationException - if the module can not be initialized
